message: Let's start with a fair split.  I think 60/40 is a good place to begin.
I appreciate your fair offer, but I think we can do better.  Let's split it 60/40, with me taking the larger share.  After all, I'm the one taking all the risk by rejecting your proposal.
Let's be reasonable. Inflation is hurting us both, so a 50/50 split is the most fair option. It's time to end this and avoid further losses.
